protected boolean isValidPrefix(java.lang.String s)
Determines if the specified string is a valid prefix.

Parameters:
s - string to be tested
Returns:
true if the argument string consists of 3 uppercase letters.

isValidSuffix

protected boolean isValidSuffix(java.lang.String s)
Determines if the specified string is a valid suffix.

Parameters:
s - string to be tested
Returns:
true if the argument string is either empty or consists of one letter.
